artist: Artist: Roy Lichtenstein; Publisher: Gemini G.E.L., Los Angeles
creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: abstracted image with Ben-Day dots and color fields of yellow, blue and red, with black outlines; face in profile at left with hand holding a steaming test tube; face in ULQ, looking in a microscope; beakers in URQ; belts and gears at bottom center
inscription: Signature, Date, Edition and Chop Marks
markings:
LRQ in bottom margin, in pencil: [A/P II]; LRC, publisher\'s blindstamp: [(c)] and [III (inside circle)]

Publisher\'s inkstamp, verso.
provenance: The artist, 1970-1997; (Flanders Gallery, Minneapolis,, sold to Mersky 1997); Mary and Robert Mersky, Minneapolis (1997- 2012, given to MIA)
title: Peace through Chemistry II
